about_the_game:
Mob Boss Simulator puts you in the shoes of a legendary crime boss, ruling the streets and shaping the underworld to your advantage. Build your empire by forging alliances, eliminating threats, and staying one step ahead of your enemies. But remember—power is a delicate game of strategy, deception, and force.

Run illicit businesses like bootlegging, underground casinos, and racketeering. Rob banks, hijack shipments, and even target rival families’ casinos to cripple their income. The streets are yours to control, but staying on top means knowing when to strike and when to lay low.

Corruption is key—buy off politicians, police, and even newspapers to manipulate public opinion and keep the law on your side. But be careful, as even the most loyal cops have their limits. Too much chaos, and they might turn against you.

When diplomacy fails, violence speaks. Hire assassins to take out underbosses, crew members, or even rival dons. If necessary, wage all-out war, unleashing chaos in the streets as your men clash with enemy families. Just remember—every action has consequences, and only the smartest boss will survive.

To make it truly authentic, we studied real-life mobsters—their history, strategies, and the way they spoke. Skilled voice actors bring their voices to life, immersing you in a world where power is everything, and trust is a rare commodity.

Do you have what it takes to rule the underworld?
